title: New downtown Macon hair salon cuts ribbon for grand opening 23 hours ago
content: Main Street Macon cut the ribbon Friday celebrating EcheSalon’s grand opening downtown/Miles Garrett (WGXA)      MACON, Ga. -- Main Street Macon cut the ribbon Friday celebrating EcheSalon’s grand opening downtown.   EcheSalon is own and operated by Amber Caldwell.    It's a full-service hair salon providing cutting-edge precision techniques in hair cutting and innovative imaginations for hair color.   Stylists specialize in healthy hair coloring and offer a diverse palette of colors ranging from natural hair colors to the full spectrum of the rainbow for all hair types. Additionally, the Salon offers extensions, facial waxing, mini facials, with plans to offer more in the future. Eche Salon also books for weddings and special occasions.
